annotations.description: The Garibaldi is one of my all time favorite Highball drinks and it is so simple and so refreshing. I also want to note that those who claim to dislike Campa...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Garibaldi

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Campari
4oz (120ml) Orange Juice
Orange Twist

Shake Orange Juice to airrate
Add Campari to highball with ice
Pour orange juice on top. 
Garnish with large orange twist. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sw3Dl6flNks
title: Garibaldi
